goal:
NGV Global services the rapidly growing natural gas vehicle (NGV) industry worldwide, including water and rail transportation. Together with our network of affiliated associations, we represent approximately 350 companies and organisations.

The prime objective of the Association is to increase the use of natural gas and biomethane for transport and to facilitate efficiency, safety and durability in all areas of the industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: NGV Global is concerned about emissions regulations, transportation programs with a focus on clean fuels, biomethane activities and renewable transportation fuels, as well as vehicle and engine technologies all related to using gas (CNG, LNG, biomethane, hydrogen) as the principle fuel.  These are applicable to the entire range of transport sector mobility including road vehicles, marine applications and, in future, railway applications. We also follow the related work of CEN for such things as fuel quality and all standards and regulations concerning natural gas and and natural gas vehicles.
